title: When Bob Dylan first started, he performed in what kind of venue? - Quora

response.answer_text: I heard, but it was before my time, that he did some folk and poetic venue of expression in smaller gigs just to test his talents. But it could just be the hippies I know thinking that was his early stints? Hopefully someone of that early era can confirm this?
Well, when he first came to New York City, he played in coffee shops, or “basket houses". Places like the Cafe Wha ? , Gaslight Cafe, and Gerde's Folk City.
